CARD_TIP.S:
Engage. You gain +3 if you have engaged the target since the start of your last turn.

After engaging: You gain +3 to the next engagement you make against the target before the end of your next turn.

BUY_COST.S: Engage. +3 if you engaged them last turn. +3 if you engage them next turn.

CARD_TIP.S:
[Primary Clever]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

Use this ability when you would be able to use a prep action.

Choose and learn any one trait of a foe.

Engage with +1 range.

After engaging: Hustle the target.

BUY_COST.S: Engage with +1 range, and Hustle the target.

CARD_TIP.S:
Jab a foe.

(This technique counts as a Jab, so it cannot be Surged or Combined unless an effect specifically allows you to Surge or Combine your Jabs.

Choose either Force or Composure, and choose an ally. The ally gains +2 to the chosen stat until the start of your next turn.

Heal.

BUY_COST.S: Heal one ally. They gain either +2 Force or +2 Composure.

CARD_TIP.S: Heal an ally. Hustle that ally unless they have already been Hustled this round.

BUY_COST.S: Heal an ally. Hustle them unless they've been Hustled this round.

CARD_TIP.S:
[Compassion/Clever Calling]

Make a Gentle engagement.

After engaging, choose a hero, and choose a foe. The chosen hero gains a Force bonus to their first engagement before the start of your next turn, and the chosen foe takes a Force penalty to their first engagement before the start of your next turn, equal to 4 times your Gentled damage.

BUY_COST.S: Engage Gentle. Hero gains +4 Force per gentled, foe gets -4 Force per gentled.

CARD_TIP.S:
Choose an ally. That ally gains +3 Force to the next engagement they make before your next turn.

Heal.

BUY_COST.S: Heal an ally. They gain +3 to their next engagement.

CARD_TIP.S:
[Courage/Compassion Calling]

Before engaging, you may spend any amount of Morale, up to your current amount.

Engage with +2 for each Morale spent.

BUY_COST.S: Engage. You may spend Morale to gain +2 per.

CARD_TIP.S:
[Compassion/Courage Calling ]

Engage. After engaging, you gain this Aura effect until the end of your next turn: When a foe makes an engagement while in your zone, the target of their engagement may Jab that foe.

BUY_COST.S: Engage and gain Aura: If ally in your zone is engaged, ally may Jab engaging foe.

CARD_TIP.S: Prep this action: When another hero you can sense is engaged, you may grant them +2 Composure against that engagement.

BUY_COST.S: Prep: Give engaged ally +2 Composure once.

CARD_TIP.S:
You choose one Outlook at the beginning of each encounter, and gain its benefits until the encounter ends.

Each time you roll Gathering, gain 1 extra Courage focus.

BUY_COST.S:
Choose 1 Outlook each encounter.
You gain +1 Courage focus each Gathering.

CARD_TIP.S:
You choose one Outlook at the beginning of each encounter, and gain its benefits until the encounter ends.

Each time you roll Gathering, gain 1 extra Compassion focus.

BUY_COST.S:
Choose 1 Outlook each encounter.
You gain +1 Clever focus each Gathering.

CARD_TIP.S:
You choose one Outlook at the beginning of each encounter, and gain its benefits until the encounter ends.

Each time you roll Gathering, gain 1 extra Clever focus.

BUY_COST.S:
Choose 1 Outlook each encounter.
You gain +1 Clever focus each Gathering.

CARD_TIP.S:
You choose one Outlook at the beginning of each encounter, and gain its benefits until the encounter ends.

If you lost any Hope last encounter, then you must choose Hopeful Outlook this encounter.

Hopeful Outlook provides no benefit.

BUY_COST.S:
Choose this Outlook if you lost Hope last encounter.
This outlook gives no bonus.

CARD_TIP.S: Character sheet will be updated on the printed images automatically.
Character sheet will be updated on the printed images automatically.
